channel.title: Adding drops
channel.description:
How do i add drops to my server :confused:
im making a new train in some source and i added a ice giant and a fire giant and they drop nothing how do i change it to make them drop like 1m or some rune or stuff...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 12, 2009, 09:37:35 pm[/size][hr]any one...? comeon... lol ...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 12, 2009, 10:15:29 pm[/size][hr]lol... i just figured out my self rofl... lol can a mod lock this :P?
